5 objects are mispriced at Â§1 simoleon.  They are from 2 sets.

2 from the December 2009, Happy Holidays Presents set:

Menorah Candle Holder "lightingTableMennorah.Sims3Pack"

Kinnara Candle Holder "lightingTableKinnara.Sims3Pack"

And 3 from the January 2010 set, Dr Pepper Las Vegas set:

Lips of Loveseat "loveseatVegasLips.Sims3Pack"

The Time PassĂŠ Lounge "loveseatVegasRetro.Sims3Pack"

Actually the other 4 objects from the Happy Holidays Presents were also mispriced, but I learned that it's not a problem with your files, but rather the problem was with rachelstoolbox's "Complete Sims 3 Store" torrent.  So sorry to waste your time, and I'll take it up with her.
